TermDefinition.DefinitionText: Lung cancer in which the cells are large and look abnormal when viewed under a microscope.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "large cell carcinoma"
Pronunciation of dictionary term "carcinoma de células grandes"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Cáncer de pulmón en el que las células son grandes y tienen una apariencia anormal cuando se observan bajo un microscopio.
